name: Let There Be Chaos (WoodchuckXL)
description:
Fulfil the wishes of a being of chaos, and bring chaos to  small, peaceful village. This game was made in ~5 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. I made all of the assets in this game during the provided time period.

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move.

Z or E to interact

Escape to open the pause menu
